h1_title: Chapter 2 Secret - Kingdom of Sahali Walkthrough
content: In this second phase, things will get even easier thanks to the Yellow Wind Sage on your side. You’ll be able to let him to the main talking. He can deal incredible damage with his wind attacks, which you can supplement by continuing the assault on his claws.You’ll still need to be mindful of his charge attacks and claw swipes, but you’re given more room to hang back and heal while the rat takes the brunt of his aggression.

This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_2_Secret-Kingdom_of_Sahali_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 2 Secret - Kingdom of Sahali Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Fuban'.
The content is as follows:
In this second phase, things will get even easier thanks to the Yellow Wind Sage on your side. You’ll be able to let him to the main talking. He can deal incredible damage with his wind attacks, which you can supplement by continuing the assault on his claws.You’ll still need to be mindful of his charge attacks and claw swipes, but you’re given more room to hang back and heal while the rat takes the brunt of his aggression.
